response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to both of us, as it is worth $10,000 to you and represents a substantial investment for me. Considering its unique qualities and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the chance to purchase it directly from me at this special price. My proposal is to extend the offer at a price of $9,500. This represents a favorable deal for you while ensuring a fair return for my efforts and resources invested into obtaining this item. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product while allowing for a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 9500}
